ActionsManager - Class in eu.clementime.rds
Action manager manages the display of the 3 actions the doll can do during the game, when touching an item, animation, or area: take, look at or talk to.
ActionsManager() - Constructor for class eu.clementime.rds.ActionsManager
 
actionsManagerOutsideBorders - Variable in class eu.clementime.rds.Screen
Avoid doll trying to go until action manager if it is out of reach for her.
actionTake - Variable in class eu.clementime.rds.ScreenItem
 
actionTalk - Variable in class eu.clementime.rds.ScreenItem
 
activate(float, float, float, float, int[], boolean) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.ActionsManager
Looks for what actions are possible for item/anim/area touched.
activateActionOnAnim(Anim) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Screen
When an animation is touched, open action manager with actions matching this animation (if there are).
activateActionOnItem(ScreenItem) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Screen
When an item is touched, open action manager with actions matching this animation (if there are).
activateModifier(int) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.World
Triggers +/-10 kinds of modifier, that is to say changes in database: combination (switch allowed/not allowed), change item position (switch screen/inventory/nowhere), take, look, talk, takeable (yes/no), exit (visible/not visible), modify starting trigger in screen table.
activateMovingArrow(int) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Screen
Activates moving arrows, i.e.
activateTrigger(int) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.World
Triggers 6 kinds of actions: launch an animation, change database with a modifier, move or hide doll, show a bubble, hide/show an item or hide/show an animation.
addItem(int, Engine, Scene) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Inventory
Loads image and create sprite of a new item after the doll took it, add it at then end of the inventory, attach it to the AndEngine scene, register touch area and set ZIndex.
addItemAtEnd(InventoryItem) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Inventory
Draws item at the end of normal view inventory.
addItemOnScreen(int, Engine, Scene) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Background
Checks if there is an existing area at the touched point.

Anim - Class in eu.clementime.rds
Every animation: landscape animation or characters (=looping and not moving animation, called static animations) and animation sequences, for story (=looping or not, moving or not).
